content.value:
when I did a brief stint as a PM, I learned a TON of useful skills that I still use as an engineer.

fellow engineers: have you ever heard of the "2x2" ("two by two") device for making decisions? if not. pull up a seat!

The 2x2 is a sorting tool that starts out like this:
content.html: when I did a brief stint as a PM, I learned a TON of useful skills that I still use as an engineer. fellow engineers: have you ever heard of the "2x2" ("two by two") device for making decisions? if not. pull up a seat! The 2x2 is a sorting tool that starts out like this:

photo.alt: a coordinate plane with "high impact" and "low impact" on the ends of the Y axis, "quick" and "slow" on either end of the X axis
